DOC.brief_summary: This study tries to improve patient's activity by a "Prescription for Activity" led by physiotherapists in secondary health care setting. Three groups are compared in regard to their increase of physical activity.
DOC.brief_title: Activity on Prescription to Promote Physical Activity in Hospitalized Patients
DOC.criteria: aged 4075 years selfdependent walk around at home alone Germanspeaking Ability to read and write Life expectancy > 6 months Stable disease process expected for the next 6 months Time spend in hospital: > 3 days, < 4 weeks Patients suffering from dementia Planned participation in rehabilitation severe functional limitations that precluded any increase in physical activity not living independently
